PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2003-00432003-01-27LAB,  ,  ,  , 
ActCanada Labour Code
PrecisAppointment of LOUISE FECTEAU of Outremont, Quebec, to be a full-time member of the Canada Industrial Relations Board, to hold office during good behaviour for a term of five years; orders that LOUISE FECTEAU be deemed to be employed in the Public Service for the purposes of the Public Service Superannuation Act; and determines that LOUISE FECTEAU shall reside within 210 kilometres of the National Capital Region; effective February 3, 2003.
AttachmentsAttachment
